desc: Specify config file
Do not run passwd to set the password
Do not set password, but allow non-password logins (e.g. SSH RSA)
Apply only a weak check for validity of the user/group name
Set the gecos field for the new entry generated
When creating a group, force the groupid to be the given number
Create a group
Display brief instructions
Use specified directory as the user's home directory
Use shell as the user's login shell, rather than the default
Add the new user to GROUP instead of a usergroup or the default group
Do not create the home directory
Suppress informational messages, only show warnings and errors
Be verbose, most useful if you want to nail down a problem with adduser
Create a system user or group
Force the new userid to be the given number
Override the first uid in the range that the uid is chosen from (FIRST_UID)
ID Override the last uid in the range that the uid is chosen from (LAST_UID)
Add new user to extra groups defined in the configuration file
Display version and copyright information
